plot: A team of special force ops, led by a tough but fair soldier, Major "Dutch" Schaefer, are ordered in to assist CIA man, George Dillon, on a rescue mission for potential survivors of a Helicopter downed over remote South American jungle. Not long after they land, Dutch and his team discover that they have been sent in under false pretenses. This deception turns out to be the least of their worries though, when they find themselves being methodically hunted by something not of this world.

m.role: Bash Brothers: Blain and Mac served in the same unit in Vietnam.
Predator. Just before fighting the title creature, Billy cuts two wounds in his chest with his knife.
Mr. Fanservice: Almost every male character is shirtless at some point and all are well built and muscled. Dutch in particular spends the climax of the movie shirtless.

Mac from Predator.
 Predators has Mombasa.
 According to Roger Ebert, the Predator itself is subtly modeled after this trope.

Scary Black Man: Mac, in the first film. Double subverted in that, for most of his screen time, he's scared shitless himself... but after his Heroic BSOD, he's downright terrifying. Played straight in Predator 2 where Scary Black Men include the main character, the Jamaican gangsters and their leader King Willie (the last more because his voodoo belief and behavior than his physical strength}.
Shirtless Scene: Dillon, Billy, Poncho and Dutch all get at least one. Dutch acts as a Walking Shirtless Scene for the climax.
Walking Shirtless Scene: Dutch is this for the climax.

f.role: Action Girl: From Predator 2 onwards, the female leads became these.
The Chick / The Sixth Ranger: Anna

name: Predator
